greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse binomial transform of A084101.
comment: The sequence 2, -2, 0, 4, -8, 8, 0, -16, 32, -32, 0, 64, -128, 128, 0,.. (without the leading 1) is the Lucas V(-2,2) sequence. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 08 2013
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,-2).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 15 2003
